query:
UPDATE song_publishing_review SET
                user_id = $1,
                song_display_id = $2,
                data = $3,
                submit_time = $4,
                update_time = $5,
                review_time = $6,
                review_comment = $7,
                status = $8,
                type = $9,
                comment = $10
            WHERE id = $11
